QuestData.Title: The Dark Side of the Moon
QuestData.Description: <Prophet Velen's voice continues.>$B$BYrel and I have located Warlord Ner'zhul. He is meeting with Grommash Hellscream atop the highest altar overlooking Anguish Fortress.$B$BMeet us there. We must stop him.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ner'zhul will pay for what he has done.
QuestData.RewardText: We saved everyone we could, $n. We were too late for the others... including my sister.$b$bProphet Velen is right. When it is asked of us, we ALL must fight. I promise this: I will never again let my loved ones suffer.$b$bNer'zhul is close to calling down the Dark Star. We are the only ones who can stop him.

Objectives.Objective: Find Velen and Yrel at the Terrace of the Stars
